author: Zak Cheney-Rice
title: Coronavirus Fears Spark Prison Strikes, Protests, and Riots Around the World
description: From Colombia to France to the U.S., prisoners are struggling to protect themselves where their jailers won’t.
content: By many estimates, the United States is still weeks away from seeing the worst of the novel coronavirus. The illnesss rapid spread, along with expanded testing, are producing higher and more comprehensive infection counts, which currently outpace the rate inc… [+5644 chars]
